text: Huntington Station is a hamlet and census-designated place (CDP) in the Town of Huntington in Suffolk County, on Long Island, in New York, in the United States. 34,878 people lived here at the 2020 census. It is part of the greater Huntington area. == References == Category:Hamlets in New York (state) Category:Census-designated places in New York (state)
title: Huntington Station, New York
